mapper.select: select MOTGAPROPTINFSGMTSEQNO, PLENM, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_MOTGAPROPTINFSGMT

select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_MotgaProptInfSgmt info1 join PBCRS_REPORT_PleInf info2 on info1.MOTGAPROPTINFSGMTSEQNO=info2.COMRECINFSGMTSEQNO where info1.MOTGAPROPTINFSGMTSEQNO = #{ComRecInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
